snippet: A $5.3 billion rail project is scheduled to begin this spring, offering powerful evidence of how much the island, a symbol of Pacific tranquillity, is changing.
abstract: Construction is set to begin on $5.3 billion Honolulu rail project on western Oahu, ending a 40-year battle to build a mass transit line on the Hawaiian island; line, scheduled for completion in 2018, is designed to accommodate increasing crush of commuters and tourists, but has drawn fierce opposition from environmentalists and community leaders.
lead_paragraph: A $5.3 billion rail project is scheduled to begin this spring, offering powerful evidence of how much the island, a symbol of Pacific tranquillity, is changing.

headline.seo: Hawaii Train Line Is Likely to Rise on Oahu
headline.main: After 40-Year Battle, Train May Roll for Oahu
headline.print_headline: After 40-Year Battle, Train May Roll for Oahu
